channel.title: network on Analyst
channel.description: Recent content in network on Analyst

item.title: DHCP
item.description: Dynamic Host Configuration Protocol. Listening on 67 port. Sending from 68. DHCP Discover (Broadcast) C-> S

item.title: DNS
item.description: Domain Name System. Translates IPs to domain names like 192.168.1.1 to router.lan and visa versa.

item.title: Kerberos
item.description: Intro Secure shell. Significant improvement over telnet for remote control (since telnet was not encrypting the connection).

item.title: SSH
item.description: Intro Secure shell. Common ports: 22. Structure ![photo_2021-02-16 11.58.08](images/photo_2021-02-16 11.58.08.jpeg) The Flow - Wanna talk

item.title: Syslog
item.description: Not sure yet wether it belongs to this section. It makes the most sense to put it here until I am sure.

item.title: SSL and TLS
item.description: This article explains how SSL and its successsor work. Intro SSL makes use of assymmetric encryption for verification and symmetric encryption for data exchanging.
